item.title: How do I change weapon stances?
item.dc:creator: @xLove xLove
item.description:
@xLove wrote:

Download new Stances or if u already got the stance ID u want.

Replace the 407 to the ID of the stand u want Compile and, Tada!

[i]xLove[/i
